start: ^I am the Dryad of the Indian River Lagoon...
^...but I live on the edge of the coastline.
examine_dead_mangrove: ^A dead mangrove tree. They can survive in salt water.

b: ^Hm... if I can use my magic to bring these mangroves back to life, the other plants might be able to breathe.

examine_dead_palm: ^A palm tree. Florida is famous for them.
examine_dead_fern: ^I think this may have been some kind of fern.
resurrect_live_plant: ^That plant is doing just fine now.
no_water: ^The land plants can't breathe on their own... they need the mangroves to protect the shoreline.
first_mangrove_healed: ^I can heal the mangrove with only a touch.
first_island_healed: ^I've healed the mangroves around me, and the tree...
third_island_healed: ^The lagoon is beginning to return to life. But there's still more work to be done.
gameover: ^YES! Yes! I've healed every plant on this loop of islands.
^My powers are exhausted... but with the beginning of an ecosystem, life can return to the lagoon.
^The people may be all gone, retreated inland. There are only these tiny islands.
^But for now, the islands can breathe.
